overview: From a planet many light year away from us, immortals (The High-Landers) arrive on Earth where they live a life of unbridled sex. One fine day their chief recalls them to their own planet where he admonishes them for their lecherous way of life and reminds them that only one of them is immortal, the sole survivor of a series of duels. But one couple rebels against this edictâ€¦
tagline: A film destined to become a classic
title: Eternal Desire
